name: Villa Park
shortDescription: A quiet, primarily residential Orange County city known for large lots, tree-lined streets, and top-rated schools.
fullDescription: Villa Park is a small, serene community nestled within the City of Orange in Orange County. Known for its spacious homes, lush landscaping, and strong sense of community, it offers a peaceful suburban lifestyle with convenient access to shopping, dining, and major freeways. Residents enjoy proximity to regional parks, quality schools, and nearby destinations across the county.
heroImageAlt: Tree-lined residential street in a quiet suburban neighborhood

neighborhoods.name: Orange
neighborhoods.description: Historic city with a vibrant Old Towne district, shopping, and parks; surrounds Villa Park.

neighborhoods.name: Tustin
neighborhoods.description: Well-situated city with historic Old Town, shopping, and family-friendly parks.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Shopping and dining area in Tustin

neighborhoods.name: Yorba Linda
neighborhoods.description: Upscale suburban city with equestrian trails, parks, and spacious neighborhoods.

highlights.title: Villa Park Town Center
highlights.description: Local hub with shops, dining, and everyday services right in the community.

highlights.title: Parks & Open Spaces
highlights.description: Neighborhood parks and nearby regional trails for walking, biking, and outdoor relaxation.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Tree-shaded path through a suburban park

highlights.title: Top-Rated Schools
highlights.description: Served by highly regarded schools in the Orange Unified School District.

highlights.title: Convenient Access
highlights.description: Close to SR-55, SR-91 and major OC destinations including shopping and entertainment.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Freeway interchange and skyline at dusk

faqs.question: What is Villa Park known for?
faqs.answer: Villa Park is known for its quiet residential character, large lots, and proximity to top-rated schools and parks.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Villa Park?
faqs.answer: The market primarily features single-family homes on larger lots, with strong demand for spacious properties.

faqs.question: What can you do nearby?
faqs.answer: Explore Old Towne Orange, shop and dine in Anaheim and Tustin, and enjoy nearby regional parks and trails.

faqs.question: How is commuting from Villa Park?
faqs.answer: Villa Park offers quick access to SR-55 and SR-91, connecting to employment centers across Orange County and beyond.
